news.title: New Publication in CVPR 2025
news.description: Our latest work on automated medical diagnosis has been accepted to CVPR 2025.

news.title: New Dataset Release
news.description: Released PAXRay dataset with 100K+ chest X-ray images for automated diagnosis research.

featured_work.title: CVPR Tutorial: Identifying Structure in Data
featured_work.description: An in-depth exploration of state-of-the-art data exploration techniques including dimensionality reduction for data visualization and clustering methods, with a strong focus on computer vision applications.

featured_work.title: PAXRay: Automated Chest X-Ray Analysis
featured_work.description: Deep learning system for automated diagnosis from chest X-ray images, achieving state-of-the-art performance on multiple pathology detection tasks.
